item.title: WordPress Vulnerability Scanner: Protect Your Website from Malware
item.author: Researcher
item.description: Woo Link WordPress is one of the most popular content management systems, powering millions of websites worldwide. However, its popularity also makes it a prime target for hackers and malware attacks. To ensure the security of your WordPress site, it’s crucial to regularly scan it for vulnerabilities and malware. In this article, we will discuss the importance of using a WordPress vulnerability scanner and provide guidance on running malware scans effectively.
